committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to establish within the Department of Education and Office of Vocational and Adult Education and Community Colleges.

summary.text: Amends the Department of Education Organization Act to establish within the Department of Education an Office of Vocational and Adult Education and Community Colleges, which is to be administered by the Assistant Secretary of Vocational and Adult Education and Community Colleges. Transfers to such Assistant Secretary all functions of the Assistant Secretary of Postsecondary Education related to community colleges.

titles.title: A bill to establish within the Department of Education and Office of Vocational and Adult Education and Community Colleges.
